message.body: What day is the official make sure your not in the apartment day
I think August 9th? I know they'll send a move out package so the date might be on it. Otherwise I'd call them.
No because everyone's move out dates are different.
K I just wondered if it was on the news letter
I also don't know when exactly ill get the bill for our last month so just remember we'll owe some random amount lol
Well be moved out we can just change our names and not pay. Live a treacherous life of lies and deceit
Lol it would be a bad month to skip, they'd keep our deposit which is way more than rent lol
Hahah yeah, unfortunately I'd like a large part of the deposit back lol
Damn your right. Then they would just call us stupid liars and deceivers
Yeah me too that would be a bonus check for expenses. You get a new laptop yet?
Yup, it'd be great. Yeah I did.
Haha no, I'm used to it
Is it so small your freaking out? Haha
